name: Wazzupo
description:
Wazzupo

WASD to move. Space to drop blobs of slime. Left Ctrl to pick up blobs of slime.

A slime stuck in a dungeon wants to go out to see the world. When the slime dies, it comes back, leaving some blob of slime where it died.

There is a hidden letter in each room, spell out all the letters with your slime to achieve the super mega ultra true ending. Hint: Its Latin for "to give a game" :)

Credits:

Developed by 3E, small team of friends

Big Thanks to Pixel Pete, Brackeys, BlackThornProd, Family & Friends

No music/sounds. Some graphics made by team.

Additional Assets used:

CanariPack 1BIT TopDown https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-1bit-topdown

EggBit Dungeon Tileset https://crowbarska.itch.io/eggbit-dungeon-tileset

Tools Used:

Game Engine - Unity 2019

Graphics - Aseprite
